ref.mixed-citation:
Hassert M
Wolf KJ
Schwetye KE
CD4+T cells mediate protection against Zika associated severe disease in a mouse model of infection. PLoS Pathog 2018; 14: e1007237. 30212537

note.p:
This study shows that CD4 T cells are necessary and protective against ZIKV infection in Ifnar
-/- mice.
